      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        When upgrading our database by incrementing @param DATABASE_VERSION, this will delete the current table and create a new one.
        Parameters:
        db - The database that contains our table
        oldVersion - An integer indicating the database version of the old database
        newVersion - An integer indicating the database version of the current database
